text: Mario's Time Machine is an educational video game. It was released for MS-DOS, Super NES, NES, and Microsoft Windows. It is a history education game. Category:1993 video games Category:DOS games Category:Educational video games Category:Mario video games Category:Nintendo Entertainment System games Category:Single-player video games Category:Super Nintendo Entertainment System games Category:Video games about time travel Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Video games set in France Category:Video games set in the United States
title: Mario's Time Machine
